price: On that Day man will be informed of what he has sent forth[4] and left behind[5].
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
footnotes:
[4] i.e., of his deeds for the Hereafter.
 [5] i.e., that which he failed to do.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
